price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Kada ku riƙi ubanninku da 'yan'uwanku masõya, idan sun nũna son kãfirci a kan ĩmãni*. Kuma wanda ya jiɓince su daga gare ku, to, waɗan nan sũ ne Azzãlumai.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ ءَابَآءَكُمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنَكُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ إِنِ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ عَلَى ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّهُم مِّنكُمۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: * Idan an umurci mutum ya rabu da ubansa da 'yan'uwansa kãfirai, sabõda shĩ yanã Musulmi, to, ga waninsu abin yã fi ƙarfi.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
